plot outline: Rahul computer engineer in US looses his job.His girlfriend stands by him during difficult time thou her father opposes it.Rahul's sister marriage is almost fixed he borrows money from Don Bhai Raja who gives him the loan at the behest of his friend.But sets a deadline to repay it.Rahul fails to repay the loan on the given days and asks Bhai Raja for more time.Bhai Raja gives me a deadline of 5:00 pm on the same day to arrange the money and if he fails to pay he will be killed.
title: Time Bara Vait
plot: There are two kinds of time - good and bad. A young couple madly in love with each other gets trapped into the underworld and its menace. Can they beat their bad time for the good?

Rahul computer engineer in US looses his job.His girlfriend stands by him during difficult time thou her father opposes it.Rahul's sister marriage is almost fixed he borrows money from Don Bhai Raja who gives him the loan at the behest of his friend.But sets a deadline to repay it.Rahul fails to repay the loan on the given days and asks Bhai Raja for more time.Bhai Raja gives me a deadline of 5:00 pm on the same day to arrange the money and if he fails to pay he will be killed.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
